rows.mountdesc: This docile beast is young yet.
rows.newday: You strap your {weapon} to your pony's saddle bags, and head out for some adventure!
rows.recharge: `&Remembering that is has been quite some time since you last fed your pony, you decide this is a perfect time to relax and allow it to graze the field a bit. You doze off enjoying this peaceful serenity.`0
rows.partrecharge: `&You dismount in the field to allow your pony to graze for a moment even though it has recently been fully fed.  As you lean back in the grass to watch the clouds, your pony whickers softly and trots off into the underbrush.  You search for a while before returning to the fields hoping that it'll return.  A short time later, your pony trots back into the clearing holding its head high, looking much more energized and with a very equine grin on its face.`0
